data.message: Hate to brake it to the people that say pac is better or was the best in his time which he may have been but if em was all over the radio back then he would have murdered pac and big on a track all day long no way around it pac nor big is the greatest of all time eminem is by far the greatest must we remember pac nor big sold big until they were dead but both great artist cant match up to the rap god sorry to break it to you truth hurts sometimes but the truth will set you free
